person.persName: Albert A. Curtis, Sr. (Irvine, Kentucky, merchant and politician)

body.p: Irvine, Kentucky, merchant and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Manerva M. Curtis. Father of Ann E. Curtis, William Curtis, David Curtis, Mary Curtis, Albert A. Curtis, Jr., Edward B. Curtis, Thomas Curtis, and Bettie Curtis. Merchant in Estill County from 1850 to 1863. Owned one enslaved person in 1850 and eight in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Estill County from 1861 to 1865.
